scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && powershell -Command "if (Test-Path temp-deploy) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force temp-deploy }; git clone https://github.com/wSoltani/wSoltani.github.io.git temp-deploy; git -C temp-deploy rm -rf .; xcopy dist\* temp-deploy\ /E /Y; if (-not (Test-Path temp-deploy\assets)) { mkdir temp-deploy\assets }; xcopy dist\assets\* temp-deploy\assets\ /E /Y; git -C temp-deploy add .; git -C temp-deploy commit -m 'Update portfolio'; git -C temp-deploy push origin main; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force temp-deploy"
